profileAlternative.name: Jonathan DeStefano
profileAlternative.headline: Software engineer specializing in technical writing and documentation team management.
profileAlternative.summary:
Dynamic software engineer experienced in technical writing, requirements gathering, design, development and testing. Passionate about learning new skills and able to do so quickly and efficiently. Possesses admirable
interpersonal skills utilized to collaborate with colleagues and clientele. Able to undertake and
accomplish complex tasks independently. Developed commendable leadership skills through years of
team management and coordinating projects.

aboutAlternative.text:
Dynamic software engineer experienced in technical writing, requirements gathering, design, development and testing. Passionate about learning new skills and able to do so quickly and efficiently. Possesses admirable
interpersonal skills utilized to collaborate with colleagues and clientele. Able to undertake and

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
• Manage a distributed team of seven and lead documentation efforts for MongoDB Atlas, MongoDB Cloud Manager, MongoDB Ops Manager, MongoDB Kubernetes Operator and the enterprise tools listed below.
• Streamlined the triage, review, tooling processes to improve team efficiency and throughput.
• Champion for process and collaboration improvements.
• Actively contribute to all documentation repositories.

roles.title: Lead Technical Writer - Cloud & Enterprise Tools

positions.title:
Title
Lead Technical Writer - Cloud & Enterprise Tools
positions.description:

• Streamlined the triage, review, tooling processes to improve team efficiency and throughput.

roles.title: Lead Technical Writer - Cloud & Enterprise Tools

positions.title:
Title
Lead Technical Writer - Enterprise Tools
positions.description:
• Managed a team of three and led documentation efforts for the following products: MongoDB BI Connector, MongoDB Charts, MongoDB Compass, and MongoDB Spark Connector.
• Lead and contributed to documentation and information architecture improvements for several enterprise tools.
• Regularly provide product feedback upstream to product managers to improve the user experience. Most notably, surfaced the need for a MongoDB ODBC driver and worked with product and engineering teams to get it prioritized and scheduled. Wrote supporting documentation upon driver release.
• Experienced in information architecture design and building documentation repositories from scratch.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Technical Writer
positions.description:
• Designed and developed a Tabbed Example framework and two iterations of improvements.
• Facilitated a user experience study for the MongoDB server docs and analyzed results to identify areas where the documentation or user experience could be improved.
• Contributed to the MongoDB 3.6 docs - Replication commands, methods, and logging components.
• Documented MongoDB 3.4's faceted search, decimal BSON type, and several aggregation operators.
• Developed aspects of the redesigned docs.mongodb.com and a specialized site for tutorial content.
• Took ownership of MongoDB Spark Connector Docs and released docs for v2.0.
…
see more

positions.title: Business Analyst | Developer
positions.description:
• Advised newly converted agile team on agile and JIRA best practices, improving issue burndown.
• Coordinated projects from requirements gathering to delivery phases across multiple teams.
• Developed user interface for market regulation alert application using Angular.js.

positions.title: IT Consultant
positions.description:
• Gathered requirements and designed usability and operational enhancements to public-facing market data websites and internal billing system.
• Monitored and coordinated high profile projects and requests to completion on a global scale.
• Presented and demonstrated newly developed functionality to train business users.
• Researched and reverse-engineered undocumented legacy systems to help consolidate and
decommission unused servers and applications reducing costs.
• Discovered monitoring and automation opportunities, then implemented solutions to improve system
stability.
• Developed ETL improvements for critical S.E.C. sanctioned files reducing high severity outage
time.
• Led company-wide runbook documentation effort for ICE acquisition enabling a smooth transition
for system operations teams.
…
see more

positions.title: Associate Consultant
positions.description:
• Delivered proof of concept modules for financial analytics project using MapReduce on Cloudera
Hadoop and Amazon EMR (available on GitHub).
• Trained on key areas of analytics practice development capabilities including Hadoop MapReduce,
Hive and AWS platform for delivering efficient solutions to clientele.
• Planned and developed software test plans and test cases.
• Led functional, integration and regression testing.
• Coordinated on-shore and off-shore development and testing efforts in NYC and India.
• Produced requirements specification and business process documentation.
…

positions.title: Digital Hardware Engineer
positions.description:
• Designed, programmed, and executed numerous test procedures and applications to verify the
functionality of new devices and establish guidelines for proper use.
• Worked closely with marketing engineers on data sheets to ensure correct content and a timely
product launch.
• Created and verified schematics using multiple different CAD programs enabling multiplatform
support for clientele.
• Regularly recognized by principal engineers and management resulting in multiple internship
extensions.

positions.description:
• A+ Certified Information Technology Professional.
• Established excellent rapport with clientele through ability to explain technical terminology in a cordial and understandable manner, simultaneously increasing sales.
• Regularly exceeded daily computer repair quota.
• Recipient of numerous awards and frequently recognized by management for positive client feedback and ability to perform above the scope of work.
